exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the pectoralis major, minor, triceps, and anterior deltoids.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: Similar to the bench press but with a focus on the upper chest.

exercises.name: Decline Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: Targets the lower chest.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the pectoralis major.

exercises.name: Cable Crossovers
exercises.description: Another isolation exercise for the pectoralis major.

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the triceps, chest, and shoulders.
exercises.equipment: Bodyweight, parallel bars or dip machine

exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.description: Bodyweight exercise for the chest, triceps, and shoulders.

exercises.name: Pull-Ups
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the latissimus dorsi, biceps, and rear deltoids.

exercises.name: Barbell Rows
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the latissimus dorsi, rhomboids, and middle back.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Rows
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the latissimus dorsi.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the rear deltoids and rhomboids.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
exercises.description: Variation of the barbell row with more freedom of movement.

exercises.name: Barbell Deadlifts
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the entire posterior chain, including the hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the latissimus dorsi.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the deltoids.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the lateral deltoids.

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the anterior deltoids.

exercises.name: Reverse Flyes
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the posterior deltoids.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.description: Rotational movement targeting all three deltoid heads.

exercises.name: Barbell Squats
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the quadriceps.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the quadriceps.

exercises.name: Leg Curls
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the hamstrings.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the calves.

exercises.name: Barbell Curls
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the biceps brachii.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Curls
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the biceps brachii.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the brachioradialis.

exercises.name: Concentration Curls
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the biceps peak.

exercises.name: Barbell Skull Crushers
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the triceps brachii.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the triceps brachii.
exercises.equipment: Bodyweight, parallel bars or dip machine

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdowns
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the triceps brachii.

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extensions
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the triceps brachii.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Static exercise targeting the abdominal muscles.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the rectus abdominis.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Dynamic exercise for the obliques.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raises
exercises.description: Compound exercise for the lower abs and hip flexors.

exercises.name: Clean and Press
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting the entire body.

exercises.name: Snatch
exercises.description: Olympic weightlifting exercise requiring high coordination and power.

exercises.name: Turkish Get-Ups
exercises.description: Full-body exercise challenging balance and core strength.
